interests.name: Roshen Fountain
interests.description: One of the largest floating fountains in Europe, offering spectacular light and music shows.

interests.name: Vinnytsia Water Tower
interests.description: A historical landmark built in 1912, now serving as a War Memorial Museum.

interests.name: Gorky Park
interests.description: A beautiful green space in the heart of the city, perfect for relaxation and outdoor activities.

interests.name: Museum of Retro Cars
interests.description: An exhibition of vintage automobiles showcasing the evolution of the automotive industry.

interests.name: Vinnytsia Regional Museum
interests.description: A museum offering insights into the history and culture of Vinnytsia and its surroundings.

interests.name: Holy Transfiguration Cathedral
interests.description: An iconic Orthodox cathedral with a rich historical and architectural heritage.

interests.name: SkyPark Vinnytsia
interests.description: An exciting indoor amusement park featuring trampolines, rope courses, and adventure activities for all ages.
